DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare immune response , safety reactogenicity Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC vaccine give either without birth dose hepatitis B vaccine Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™ give healthy infant ( born mother carry hepatitis B virus ) 6 , 10 & 14 week age . This study also include small group infant bear mother carry hepatitis B virus ; infant receive birth dose hepatitis B vaccine vaccinate Tritanrix™ HepB/Hib-MenAC 6 , 10 & 14 week age .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Immune Response GSK Biologicals ' Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC Given Without With Hepatitis B Vaccine Birth Least Good Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™ Without Hepatitis B Vaccine Birth , When Given Healthy Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized study three group ( subject bear mother carry hepatitis B virus ) receive one follow vaccination regimen : - GSK Biologicals ' Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC hepatitis B vaccine birth - GSK Biologicals ' Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC hepatitis B vaccine birth - GSK Biologicals ' Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™ There also fourth group ( subject bear mother carry hepatitis B virus ) receive : - GSK Biologicals ' Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC hepatitis B vaccine birth
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy infant age 3 day less , write informed consent obtain parent , born gestation period 36 42 week . Result maternal blood sample ( presence/not hepatitis B virus ) available . Exclusion criterion : Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition , base medical history physical examination . A family history congenital hereditary immunodeficiency . Major congenital defect serious chronic illness . History neurologic disorder seizure . Administration immunoglobulins and/or blood product since birth plan administration study period ( except immunoglobulin give birth infant bear HBsAg seropositive mother ) . Acute disease time enrolment . Known exposure diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , hepatitis B , Haemophilus influenzae type b and/or meningococcal disease . Hepatitis B vaccine give birth outside study .
